title: Update homepage hero description text

requirements.text:
Update the text content rendered in the LoginPage hero description paragraph (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/p[2]) to exactly the following content (including paragraph breaks):

Phil3 is an innovative platform designed for a new generation of philanthropists, who want to contribute in achieving shared missions.

We believe Millennials and Gen Z will approach charitable giving differently from other generations. They will want to be involved and use new technologies to support the causes they care about.

Join a decentralized community where members participate in democratic governance, earn rewards through consensus meetings, and shape the future of philanthropic initiatives on the Internet Computer.

acceptanceCriteria: In the LoginPage hero section, the third paragraph (currently bound to t.homepage.description) displays exactly the provided text.
The displayed content preserves the intended paragraph breaks (three paragraphs) rather than collapsing into a single block of text.

constraints: Apply the change only to the selected element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/p[2]).
Do not edit files in frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
nonGoals: No changes to other homepage copy such as headline, tagline, value proposition, features, or CTA text.
